italic.text: To provide general transport service in the movement of personnel and cargo.

line.text: In SWORD, transporting crowds allows to move them to a given location with appropriate means. Because the agent can only transports crowds' concentrations, this mission needs a loading position to indicate which concentration to transport. Indeed, a crowd can be compouded with several separated concentrations and only one concentration can be transported at a time. The agent will transport the nearest concentration from the "loadingPoint" parameter.

The commander agent issues the "Transport" mission to all subordinate units able to perform it. The more units perform the mission, the fastest the transportation is.
Subordinate units that cannot perform the transportation mission follow others units.
Units move to the destination when all the concentration is loaded or when all units that can transport are full.
Until the concentration is not transported, all units come back to the loading position for transportation.
The mission ends when all units have reached the meeting position.
